document.full_text: nigeria's ruling party looked set to see its parliamentary majority weaken as results trickled in on sunday from an election africa's most populous nation hopes will be its first credible vote in almost two decades.
document.title: nigerian ruling party loses ground in poll
lines_and_colors: nigeria's ruling party looked set to see its parliamentary majority weaken as results trickled in on sunday from an election africa's most populous nation hopes will be its first credible vote in almost two decades.
